VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: infravision
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have optical receptors that extend into the infrared spectrum of light.

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: napalm emitters
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine slowly convert neutroamine into highly refined chemfuel, they can then expel this chemical to set things ablaze

VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.label: neutro-coagulation
VREAndroids.AndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have coagulation mechanites suffused within their neurtropumps, when these mechanites detect decreasing pressure, they go to the site of the leak and alter the neutroamine's chemical makeup to that of a solid, which stops the leak. \n(Every 10 seconds, the largest source of neutro-loss that is at least 15 seconds old will be tended to with 100% quality. However, androids still cannot heal naturally, this only prevents further neutro loss.)
